path.description: The path of the component to add the dialog to e.g. src/app/accounts/accounts-list
path.x-prompt: The path of the component to add the table to e.g. src/app/accounts/accounts-list

form_name.description: The name of the form e.g. newJobsFormGroup
form_name.x-prompt: The path of the component to add the table to e.g. src/app/accounts/accounts-list

fields.description: The name of the form fields along with thier type in the format input_name*input_type-option_one-option_two e.g. name*string,category*select-categories_array-category_name
fields.x-prompt: The path of the component to add the table to e.g. src/app/accounts/accounts-list
